instructions:
Place ribs on a broiling pan, sprinkle with steak seasoning, and bake in a 300-degree oven for 45 minutes.
Turn over and continue baking for an additional 15 minutes. Reset oven to 400 degrees, and continue baking
for an additional 5 minutes on each side or until just light brown. Do not over bake. Serves 4.

SAUCE
1 tbsp bacon drippings
1/4 cup chopped onion
1/4 cup chopped green pepper
1/4 cup water
2 tbsp vinegar
1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce
2 tbsp lemon juice
2 tbsp brown sugar
1 cup chili sauce
1/2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp paprika

In a small saucepan, sauté chopped onions in fat until light brown. Add remaining ingredients and simmer
covered for an hour. Serve as a dipping sauce. Makes 1 1/2 cups sauce. May be frozen. 
*(Rev. 2/15/93)*
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb country style pork spare ribs
name: Barbecued Spare Ribs
